alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Echols (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:56PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Echols, central Ware and Clinch Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 556 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Du Pont, or near Homerville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Homerville, Du Pont and Needmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
